archives.description: The fourth quarter of 2025 marks the 'Great Re-Rating,' where the monolithic AI trade has officially fractured. archives.title: THE YIELD CURVE SNAP
archives.description:
The Treasury market is in open revolt. The 10-Year yield has breached 5.0% for the first time in the current cycle, signaling a total loss of faith in the "Soft Landing" narrative.
                    We advise immediate rotation intoFloating Rateinstruments and short-duration cash equivalents.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: CRYPTO WINTER & CELSIUS FREEZE
archives.description: "Withdrawals Paused". The crypto lending platform Celsius Network has halted all withdrawals due to 'extreme market conditions'. Bitcoin plunges below $23k.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE MEME STOCK REVOLT
archives.description: "Power to the Players". Retail traders on Reddit have cornered hedge funds in a massive short squeeze. GME hit $483. Robinhood has halted trading. The definition of 'value' is broken.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE GREAT SHUT-IN
archives.description: "Lockdown". The global economy has come to a screeching halt. With "15 Days to Slow the Spread" in effect, markets are pricing in a depression-level GDP contraction.

archives.title: Market Mayhem Newsletter - March 20, 2020
archives.description:
Mood: "Lockdown"
   Driver: COVID-19 Pandemic
   Theme: "The Great Shut-In" — The global economy has come to a screeching halt. With "15 Days to Slow the Spread" in effect, markets are pricing in a...

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: VOLMAGEDDON
archives.description: "Short Volatility Implosion". The XIV ETN collapsed 96% in a single after-hours session. The 'short vol' trade, which had been printing money for years, evaporated instantly.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: BREXIT SHOCK
archives.description: "The Black Swan". Contrary to all polls and betting markets, the UK has voted to leave the European Union. The British Pound has crashed to a 31-year low.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE FLASH CRASH
archives.description: "998 Points in Minutes". The Dow Jones Industrial Average plunged nearly 1,000 points in minutes, only to recover shortly after. Algorithms have taken control, and they are fragile.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE LEHMAN MOMENT
archives.description: "Existential Panic". There are decades where nothing happens; and there are weeks where decades happen. This was one of those weeks. A 158-year-old bank vanished, the world's largest insurer was nationalized, and the money market broke the buck.

archives.title: Market Mayhem Newsletter - September 19, 2008
archives.description:
Mood: "Existential Panic"
   Driver: Systemic Failure
   Theme: "The Week Wall Street Broke" — There are decades where nothing happens; and there are weeks where decades happen. This was one of tho...

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE DOT COM PEAK
archives.description: "Irrational Exuberance". The NASDAQ Composite peaked today at 5,048.62. Companies with no revenue are valued at billions. The bubble has found its pin.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: ASIAN CONTAGION
archives.description: "Currency Collapse". The Thai Baht has devalued, triggering a financial tsunami across East Asia. The 'Asian Tigers' are drowning in dollar-denominated debt.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: BLACK MONDAY AFTERMATH
archives.description: "Shell-Shocked". On October 19th, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 22.6% in a single day. 508 points. It was the largest one-day percentage drop in history.

archives.title: Market Mayhem Newsletter - October 23, 1987
archives.description:

   Driver: Program Trading
   Theme: "Black Monday" — On October 19th, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 22.6% in a single day. 508 points. It was the largest one-day perc...

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: THE NIXON SHOCK
archives.description: "Gold Window Closed". President Nixon has suspended the convertibility of the dollar into gold. The Bretton Woods system is dead. Currencies are now floating in a sea of fiat.

archives.title: MARKET MAYHEM: BLACK TUESDAY
archives.description: "The Great Crash". The Roaring Twenties have ended in a scream. The stock market has collapsed, wiping out billions in wealth and shattering public confidence.
